description: GUA/07/020 REDUCCION DE RIESGO EN EL PROCESO DE RECONSTRUCCION DEL HABITAT COMUNITARIO PARA 915 FAMILIAS EN CHOKMUC, MUNICIPIO DE SANTIAGO ATITLÀN, DEPARTAMENTO DE SOLOLA.

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: 230 familias afectadas por la tormenta tropical Stan, reconstruyen su habitat comunitario con bajos niveles de riesgo en el marco del Plan de Desarrollo Municipal de Santiago de Atitlan
subproject.title: REDUCCION RIESGO HABITAT COM

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
